Anyway, we were supposed to go to the headquarters.\""},{"lineNumber":48989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。魔軍への反攻作戦を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. but"},{"lineNumber":49002,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オマケどもまでいるじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":" you're even bringing these extras anyway...\""},{"lineNumber":49010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん。それならそれで、一発逆転のし甲斐がある」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. If that's the case, then there's merit in a dramatic comeback.\""},{"lineNumber":49011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、来たかランス殿！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you came, Lord Lance!"},{"lineNumber":49012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　壮健なようでなによりだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Glad to see you're in good health!\""},{"lineNumber":49013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、お前もいたか……暑苦しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, you're here too... so oppressive.\""},{"lineNumber":49014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はははは、変わらんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, you haven’t changed.\""},{"lineNumber":49015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「指揮は陛下が？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is His Majesty commanding?\""},{"lineNumber":49016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいや、おおよそは千鶴子とマジックに任せる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, for the most part, command is left to Chizuko and Magic."},{"lineNumber":49017,"originalJapaneseLine":"　年寄りが若者の頭を押さえつけることはない」","translatedEnglishLine":" The old don't overpower the young.\""},{"lineNumber":49018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その代わりといってはなんだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In exchange, so to speak,"},{"lineNumber":49019,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も大いに戦うぞ、ランス殿！","translatedEnglishLine":" I will also fight greatly, Lord Lance!"},{"lineNumber":49020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　共に魔軍の脅威から、人類を守るのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Together, we shall protect humanity from the Demon Army's threat!\""},{"lineNumber":49021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、肩組んでくるな鬱陶しい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, stop putting your arm around me, it's annoying!\""},{"lineNumber":49022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて。じゃ、状況の説明をするわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then. I'll explain the situation.\""},{"lineNumber":49023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「西部戦線は、ここラグナロックアーク。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The western front is here at Ragnarock Arc."},{"lineNumber":49024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　東部戦線はテープを要所として、魔軍の侵攻を防いでるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":" The eastern front uses Tape as a key point to defend against the Demon Army's invasion.\""},{"lineNumber":49025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんか、全然減ってなくないか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Doesn't it seem like they haven't decreased at all?"},{"lineNumber":49026,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ魔軍に支配されまくりだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" They're still dominated by the Demon Army.\""},{"lineNumber":49027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく魔軍は数が多いのよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, the Demon Army is numerous...\""},{"lineNumber":49028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人達は大軍を率いる性格じゃなかったから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demons themselves didn’t have the nature to lead large armies,"},{"lineNumber":49029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　撤退した直属部隊も、全体からすると少ないし」","translatedEnglishLine":" so even the immediate retreating units are few compared to the whole force.\""},{"lineNumber":49030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は、支えていますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, they are holding the line, but...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……よかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm... that's good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カロリア、どうかした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Karoria, what's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「街の人たち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The people in town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前よりは辛そうじゃなくなってるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seem to be suffering less than before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そういえばそうかも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... come to think of it, that might be true."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……戦時下ですし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... we are in wartime, after all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に多くのものを失っていますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we have already lost a lot..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の脅威がなくなったのは大きいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the disappearance of the demon threat is significant."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おうおばちゃん、そのポポラパイうまそうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, ma'am, that Popora pie looks delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でかいのまるごとくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give me the big one whole."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのうち一人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One of them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は未だに人類に脅威を与え続けてるけどね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in fact, still continues to threaten humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食費的な意味で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In terms of food expenses..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がつ、ふむ、まぐっ……ん、呼んだか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gulp, hmm, mug... huh, did you call me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「呼んどらんわ！　食いながら喋るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I didn't call! Stop talking while eating!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき、入ったお店の材料が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We ate enough to finish the ingredients at the shop we just went into..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なくなるくらい食べたのに……
「ふん。とにかく司令部に行くんだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Anyway, we were supposed to go to the headquarters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。魔軍への反攻作戦を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. They should be planning a counterattack operation against the Demon Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計画しているはずです」
「よーし。さっさと行って魔物どもを叩き出すぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright. Let's hurry and drive out those monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーす。来たぞー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yo! We've arrived!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、緑の総統！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, the Green Chancellor!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっこここ、こんにちわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-hello..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいかげん、しゃんとしなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pull yourself together already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……お疲れ様です、ランス総統」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Good work, Chancellor Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たか、小僧」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You came, kid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、総統閣下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Your Excellency Chancellor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、ウスピラはいいが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, the lowly ones are fine, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オマケどもまでいるじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you're even bringing these extras along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人の軍がいなくなったおかげで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to the absence of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正規軍にもちょいっと余裕ができてな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the regular army is a little more at ease.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして軍議の場が持てるってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why we can hold this military meeting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありゃ……なんか、ずいぶん人が少ないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... there are surprisingly few people here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケバ子もいないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebako isn't here either?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子も、今は前線に出てるの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuko is also out on the front lines now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、戦況が悪くて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation is bad, anyway..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。それならそれで、一発逆転のし甲斐がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. If that's the case, then there's merit in a dramatic comeback."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、来たかランス殿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you came, Lord Lance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壮健なようでなによりだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glad to see you're in good health!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、お前もいたか……暑苦しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, you're here too... so oppressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははは、変わらんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, you haven’t changed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「指揮は陛下が？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is His Majesty commanding?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや、おおよそは千鶴子とマジックに任せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, for the most part, command is left to Chizuko and Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年寄りが若者の頭を押さえつけることはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old don't overpower the young."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その代わりといってはなんだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In exchange, so to speak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も大いに戦うぞ、ランス殿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will also fight greatly, Lord Lance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 共に魔軍の脅威から、人類を守るのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together, we shall protect humanity from the Demon Army's threat!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、肩組んでくるな鬱陶しい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, stop putting your arm around me, it's annoying!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて。じゃ、状況の説明をするわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then. I'll explain the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「西部戦線は、ここラグナロックアーク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The western front is here at Ragnarock Arc.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東部戦線はテープを要所として、魔軍の侵攻を防いでるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The eastern front uses Tape as a key point to defend against the Demon Army's invasion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか、全然減ってなくないか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Doesn't it seem like they haven't decreased at all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ魔軍に支配されまくりだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're still dominated by the Demon Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく魔軍は数が多いのよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, the Demon Army is numerous..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人達は大軍を率いる性格じゃなかったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demons themselves didn’t have the nature to lead large armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 撤退した直属部隊も、全体からすると少ないし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so even the immediate retreating units are few compared to the whole force."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今は、支えていますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, they are holding the line, but..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I'll explain the situation.\""},{"lineNumber":49023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「西部戦線は、ここラグナロックアーク。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The western front is here at Ragnarock Arc."},{"lineNumber":49024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　東部戦線はテープを要所として、魔軍の侵攻を防いでるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":" The eastern front uses Tape as a key point to defend against the Demon Army's invasion.\""},{"lineNumber":49025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんか、全然減ってなくないか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Doesn't it seem like they haven't decreased at all?"},{"lineNumber":49026,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ魔軍に支配されまくりだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" They're still dominated by the Demon Army.\""},{"lineNumber":49027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく魔軍は数が多いのよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, the Demon Army is numerous...\""},{"lineNumber":49028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人達は大軍を率いる性格じゃなかったから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demons themselves didn’t have the nature to lead large armies,"},{"lineNumber":49029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　撤退した直属部隊も、全体からすると少ないし」","translatedEnglishLine":" so even the immediate retreating units are few compared to the whole force.\""},{"lineNumber":49030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は、支えていますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, they are holding the line, but...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……よかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm... that's good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カロリア、どうかした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Karoria, what's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「街の人たち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The people in town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前よりは辛そうじゃなくなってるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seem to be suffering less than before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そういえばそうかも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... come to think of it, that might be true."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……戦時下ですし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... we are in wartime, after all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に多くのものを失っていますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we have already lost a lot..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の脅威がなくなったのは大きいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the disappearance of the demon threat is significant."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おうおばちゃん、そのポポラパイうまそうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, ma'am, that Popora pie looks delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でかいのまるごとくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give me the big one whole."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのうち一人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One of them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は未だに人類に脅威を与え続けてるけどね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in fact, still continues to threaten humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食費的な意味で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In terms of food expenses..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がつ、ふむ、まぐっ……ん、呼んだか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gulp, hmm, mug... huh, did you call me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「呼んどらんわ！　食いながら喋るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I didn't call! Stop talking while eating!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき、入ったお店の材料が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We ate enough to finish the ingredients at the shop we just went into..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なくなるくらい食べたのに……
「ふん。とにかく司令部に行くんだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Anyway, we were supposed to go to the headquarters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。魔軍への反攻作戦を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. They should be planning a counterattack operation against the Demon Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計画しているはずです」
「よーし。さっさと行って魔物どもを叩き出すぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright. Let's hurry and drive out those monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーす。来たぞー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yo! We've arrived!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、緑の総統！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, the Green Chancellor!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっこここ、こんにちわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-hello..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいかげん、しゃんとしなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pull yourself together already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……お疲れ様です、ランス総統」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Good work, Chancellor Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たか、小僧」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You came, kid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、総統閣下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Your Excellency Chancellor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、ウスピラはいいが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, the lowly ones are fine, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オマケどもまでいるじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you're even bringing these extras along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人の軍がいなくなったおかげで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to the absence of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正規軍にもちょいっと余裕ができてな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the regular army is a little more at ease.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして軍議の場が持てるってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why we can hold this military meeting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありゃ……なんか、ずいぶん人が少ないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... there are surprisingly few people here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケバ子もいないのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebako isn't here either?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子も、今は前線に出てるの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuko is also out on the front lines now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、戦況が悪くて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation is bad, anyway..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。それならそれで、一発逆転のし甲斐がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. If that's the case, then there's merit in a dramatic comeback."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、来たかランス殿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you came, Lord Lance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壮健なようでなによりだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glad to see you're in good health!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、お前もいたか……暑苦しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, you're here too... so oppressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははは、変わらんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, you haven’t changed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「指揮は陛下が？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is His Majesty commanding?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや、おおよそは千鶴子とマジックに任せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, for the most part, command is left to Chizuko and Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年寄りが若者の頭を押さえつけることはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old don't overpower the young."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その代わりといってはなんだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In exchange, so to speak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も大いに戦うぞ、ランス殿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will also fight greatly, Lord Lance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 共に魔軍の脅威から、人類を守るのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together, we shall protect humanity from the Demon Army's threat!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、肩組んでくるな鬱陶しい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, stop putting your arm around me, it's annoying!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて。じゃ、状況の説明をするわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then. I'll explain the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「西部戦線は、ここラグナロックアーク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The western front is here at Ragnarock Arc.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東部戦線はテープを要所として、魔軍の侵攻を防いでるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The eastern front uses Tape as a key point to defend against the Demon Army's invasion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか、全然減ってなくないか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Doesn't it seem like they haven't decreased at all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ魔軍に支配されまくりだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're still dominated by the Demon Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく魔軍は数が多いのよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, the Demon Army is numerous..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人達は大軍を率いる性格じゃなかったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demons themselves didn’t have the nature to lead large armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 撤退した直属部隊も、全体からすると少ないし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so even the immediate retreating units are few compared to the whole force."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今は、支えていますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, they are holding the line, but..."
